a.description: Qodana is a code quality monitoring platform that brings into your CI/CD pipelines all the smart features you love in the JetBrains IDEs as well as project-level checks like clone detection and license audit.
Learn how to get started with Qodana in a few simple steps.
Learn how to deploy Qodana locally using Docker images
Qodana provides several plugins for seamless integration with CI systems.
Our documentation provides several how-tos for integration with the most popular CI/CD systems.
Explore how to configure Qodana using various options.
Learn how you can start inspecting your code and obtain code inspection results.
Track your project changes through studying new, unchanged, and resolved problems.
See how updating PHP will affect your codebase quality.
Qodana linters can read and write reports in SARIF format, which is the industry standard for the output of static analysis tools.
Restrict the quantity of problems that can be accepted by your favorite CI/CD system
Check license compatibility between your software license and dependency licenses
